actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.
Referred to Subcommittee on Nutrition - SSAF.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to revise eligibility to participate in the food stamp program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture, in determining eligibility for participation in the food stamp program, to allow a 15 percent deduction of all earned income to compensate for work-related expenses. Entitles households with members 60 years of age or older, or who receive supplemental security income benefits or disability payments under the Social Security Act to the following: (1) an excess medical expense deduction; (2) a dependent care deduction; and (3) an excess shelter expense deduction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to revise eligibility to participate in the food stamp program, and for other purposes.
